original_text: He destroyed seven nations of people who lived in the land of Canaan. God gave their land to his own people so that they could live there.
korean_text: 가나안 땅 일곱 족속을 멸하사 그 땅을 기업으로 주시기까지 약 사백오십 년간이라

sentences.original_text: He destroyed seven nations of people
who lived in the land of Canaan
God gave their land to his own people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들의 땅을 자기 백성에게 주셨다

sentences.original_text: so that they could live there
